# pericircumference

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

A perisphere project manager, `pericircumference` starts new projects with our standard workflow

## Installation

You can install the development version of pericircumference like so:

``` r
renv::install("bcjaeger/pericircumference")
```
